main.name: Chris Carson
main.description: I was recently working on a defense contract that was cancelled early. I'm currently on the job hunt and looking to take a remote junior/internship level software engineering job with the right company.
main.bio: I completed a remote internship at Moebius Solutions, which lead to full time remote employment as a React developer for 13 months. It wasn't long enough to get my experience level past Early Career, however it was long enough to become a profficient React developer.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to call day or night with employment oppurtunities.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: 3.9 GPA - Received award for Most Innovative Capstone of graduating class

work.title: Remote Junior Software Engineer II
work.description: Worked as a Full Stack developer creating a React app for the department of defense. Received my Secret Security Clearance while at this position.

work.title: Director of IT
work.description: Oversaw the entire technical aspect of a 100+ employee, 5 branch, statewide distribution company.

projects.title: Most Innovative Capstone
projects.category: My Academic Capstone project using OpenCV and TensorFlow to detect juggling patterns in your browser. Check it out!

projects.title: Profile Website
projects.category: This site was built with Functional React.js and Babel. Check out the code on my GitHub!

projects.title: StarMax - Storefront with Admin dashboard
projects.category: This was an academic project built using PHP, JQuery, Ajax and Bootstrap. Click to view the live site!

projects.title: Peril - Multiplayer Trivia Game
projects.category: This was an academic project built using Ruby on Rails with Action Rail. Check out the code on Github!

projects.title: Connections - A Sales and Analytics Tool
projects.category: A fully functional sales tracking and reporting tool created with Google Apps Script currently in use by my previous employer. Check out the code on Google!

testimonials.text: Chris impressed me. He was a cut above the average Junior Engineer. I regret not having another contract to place him on. He will certainly contribute very well in his next development job. I'm happy to be a reference for him.
testimonials.user: Douglas MacDougal - Principle Engineer, Moebius Solutions, Inc.

testimonials.text: I highly recommend Chris to anyone looking for a Full Stack or React developer. He came a long way in the year that he was part of my team. I was surprized the company wasn't able to retain him.
testimonials.user: Jeffery Taylor - Technical Lead, Moebius Solutions, Inc.
